Steps.Message: Update at 10:19 - It's Lee from the text messaging team and I'm very pleased to inform you that our engineers have been able to restore power to all 70 customers in the NR31 9 area. They have diverted the power around the faulty section of the network. Due to the nature of an issue like this, if your power isn't back on we'll need to hear from you. To report this, or to talk to us about anything else, call us on 08003163105. We know that being without power during the current pandemic can be especially difficult, so we're sorry for the outage. Please rest assured that as key workers, our staff will continue to work around the clock to keep the lights on.

We became aware of this power cut at 07:29. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut, but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly. Engineers in our control room have switched some customers power back on in your area. To get everyone’s power back on we may need to attend to investigate and make repairs. We’ll continue to update you until everyone’s power is back on.
Steps.Name: We are restoring customers automatically

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Steps.Message: All power in the area should be back on. We’re really sorry for any disruption this caused.
Steps.Name: Power restored

They have diverted the power around the faulty section of the network. Due to the nature of an issue like this, if your power isn't back on we'll need to hear from you. To report this, or to talk to us about anything else, call us on 08003163105. We know that being without power during the current pandemic can be especially difficult, so we're sorry for the outage. Please rest assured that as key workers, our staff will continue to work around the clock to keep the lights on.

UKPNIncident.PlannedIncidentReason: We're carrying out planned work in your area. For our engineers to carry it out safely they need to turn the power off. We're doing this work as it's essential to provide reliable electricity supplies to your area. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused and thank you for your patience.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: We were investigating an issue on the high voltage electricity network that caused power issues in the area.
